class.name: AudioStreamToneGenerator
class.brief_description: An audio stream that generates periodic waveforms according to the provided variables.
class.description: [AudioStreamToneGenerator] can generate periodic waveforms from software sine, saw tooth, rectangular and Van der Pol oscillators.

members.member: Sets the duration of audio signal.
If damping is greater than zero, generated audio fades away exponentially by time. The larger the damping, the faster the audio fades.
Adjust the frequency of generated audio signal. [b]Note:[/b] It does not correspond to the actual frequency for Van der Pol oscillator but it can be interpreted as density of peaks.
Adjusts the peak value of periodic audio signals.
Adjusts the sampling rate of audio signal.
Adjust the phase of periodic audio signal.
Selects type of waveform from a list of [code]Tone (sine), Saw (saw tooth), Rect (rectangular), VanDerPol[/code].
